ta.aseloader
Class AseLoader

java.lang.Object
  ta.aseloader.AseLoader
public class AseLoader
extends java.lang.Object

Reads and converts .ASE files to a format which can be used in Java3D

Constructor Detail

AseLoader

public AseLoader(java.lang.String p_path,
                 java.lang.String p_filename)
Constructor. Loads in the passed model file, which must be .ASE.

Parameters:
p_path - The model path, not including the filename!
p_filename - The filename, not including path

AseLoader

public AseLoader(java.lang.String p_path,
                 java.lang.String[] p_filename)
Constructor. Loads in the passed model file(s). This constructor must be used if the model is supposed to be key-frame animated.

Parameters:
p_path - The model path, not including filename
p_filename - A list of filenames representing each frame. Each frame must have the same amount of faces/vertices, and it is only the vertices which will be "animatable."

getJ3DObject

public J3DObject getJ3DObject(float p_scale,
                              boolean p_skipunmaterialized,
                              boolean p_support_light)
Wrapper function. Loads a model to support lighting with curved shading.

Parameters:
p_scale - Model scale
p_skipunmaterialized - Pass true if unmaterialized faces are unwanted
p_support_light - Set to true if model is supposed to support Java3D's lighting
Returns:
J3DObject for use in Java3D
See Also:
getJ3DObject(float p_scale, boolean p_skipunmaterialized, boolean p_support_light, boolean p_random_colors, int p_shademode)

getJ3DObject

public J3DObject getJ3DObject(float p_scale,
                              boolean p_skipunmaterialized,
                              int p_shademode)
Wrapper function.

Parameters:
p_scale - Model scale
p_skipunmaterialized - Set to true if faces with no assigned material should be ignored
p_shademode - Shademode
Returns:
J3DObject for use in Java3D
See Also:
getJ3DObject(float p_scale, boolean p_skipunmaterialized, boolean p_support_light, boolean p_random_colors, int p_shademode)

getJ3DObject

public J3DObject getJ3DObject(float p_scale,
                              boolean p_skipunmaterialized,
                              boolean p_support_light,
                              boolean p_random_colors,
                              int p_shademode)
Returns the loaded model in an object which will be directly used in Java3D.

Parameters:
p_scale - Model scale
p_skipunmaterialized - Set to true if faces without a material should be ignored
p_support_light - Set to true if the model should support Java3D lighting
p_random_colors - Set to true will result in a model with random colors. Each material will be assigned a random color.
p_shademode - Four options: SHADE_NORMAL: Faces with sharp angle between them will get a "hard" edge. All other edges will be soft SHADE_CURVED: All shared edges will be soft SHADE_FLAT: All faces will appear flat SHADE_NOTLIT: The model will not support lighting.
Returns:
The object ready to be added to Java3D's branchgraph, a J3DObject

getFrameCount

public int getFrameCount()
Returns:
The number of frames the model consists of.

getVersion

public static java.lang.String getVersion()
Returns the current version number.

Returns:
Version as a string
